answers.answer: It is normal for the blood sugar to go a little crazy during the adolescent yrs. In general diabetics in this age range need to up their insulin levels, because of the rise in hormone levels.His symptoms of throwing up and nausea etc. could be due to his extreme blood sugar, but are definitely worth noting and looking into.I think the first thing that should be done is to re-evaluate his insulin needs and make changes to his treatment plan, see if things improve with his other symptoms, if not then at least you've ruled out one things and can move forward in finding out what might be the culprit.
